thread.section_title: TerraTrike Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TerraTrike | www.terratrike.com
thread.title: Marsha Doyle :

author: Marsha Doyle :
title: Marsha Doyle :
text: This Trike, the Rambler, is the most comfortable and safe ride a 72 yr old lady could have. The gearing is wonderfully smooth and easy to work with on all kinds of grades. My husband, Tom has one also and they both fit easily in our Grand Caravan, light and easy to load! We couldn't be happier with our choice. Thank you for building a truly enjoyable fitness tool that makes me want to ride it every day!!
